body_html:
Problem solved by changing the html5lib version to 0.9999999

Step 1: edit tensorflow/tools/pip_package/setup.py, update

'html5lib == 1.0b8',

to

'html5lib == 0.9999999',

Step 2: edit tensorflow/workspace.bzl, update

  native.new_http_archive(
      name = "org_html5lib",
      urls = [
          "http://bazel-mirror.storage.googleapis.com/github.com/html5lib/html5lib-python/archive/1.0b8.tar.gz",
          "https://github.com/html5lib/html5lib-python/archive/1.0b8.tar.gz",
      ],
      sha256 = "adb36c879264e8880b92589c4c4fe0814cd9d157b73328b14d728f48a6bab0a4",
      strip_prefix = "html5lib-python-1.0b8",
      build_file = str(Label("//third_party:html5lib.BUILD")),
  )

to

  native.new_http_archive(
      name = "org_html5lib",
      urls = [
          "http://bazel-mirror.storage.googleapis.com/github.com/html5lib/html5lib-python/archive/0.9999999.tar.gz",
          "https://github.com/html5lib/html5lib-python/archive/0.9999999.tar.gz",
      ],
      sha256 = "184257f98539159a433e2a2197309657ae1283b4c44dbd9c87b2f02ff36adce8",
      strip_prefix = "html5lib-python-0.9999999.tar.gz",
      build_file = str(Label("//third_party:html5lib.BUILD")),
  )

Attention, the googleapis url for 0.9999999.tar.gz is not alive, but the github one will work, so it worked

Step 1: edit tensorflow/tools/pip_package/setup.py, update
'html5lib == 1.0b8',

to
'html5lib == 0.9999999',

Step 2: edit tensorflow/workspace.bzl, update
  native.new_http_archive(
      name = "org_html5lib",
      urls = [
          "http://bazel-mirror.storage.googleapis.com/github.com/html5lib/html5lib-python/archive/1.0b8.tar.gz",
          "https://github.com/html5lib/html5lib-python/archive/1.0b8.tar.gz",
      ],
      sha256 = "adb36c879264e8880b92589c4c4fe0814cd9d157b73328b14d728f48a6bab0a4",
      strip_prefix = "html5lib-python-1.0b8",
      build_file = str(Label("//third_party:html5lib.BUILD")),
  )

to
  native.new_http_archive(
      name = "org_html5lib",
      urls = [
          "http://bazel-mirror.storage.googleapis.com/github.com/html5lib/html5lib-python/archive/0.9999999.tar.gz",
          "https://github.com/html5lib/html5lib-python/archive/0.9999999.tar.gz",

      sha256 = "184257f98539159a433e2a2197309657ae1283b4c44dbd9c87b2f02ff36adce8",

      build_file = str(Label("//third_party:html5lib.BUILD")),

Attention,  the googleapis url for 0.9999999.tar.gz is not alive, but the github one will work, so it worked
body:
Problem solved by changing the html5lib version to 0.9999999

Step 1: edit `tensorflow/tools/pip_package/setup.py`, update
```
'html5lib == 1.0b8',
```
to 
```
'html5lib == 0.9999999',
```

Step 2: edit `tensorflow/workspace.bzl`, update
```
  native.new_http_archive(
      name = "org_html5lib",
      urls = [
          "http://bazel-mirror.storage.googleapis.com/github.com/html5lib/html5lib-python/archive/1.0b8.tar.gz",
          "https://github.com/html5lib/html5lib-python/archive/1.0b8.tar.gz",
      ],
      sha256 = "adb36c879264e8880b92589c4c4fe0814cd9d157b73328b14d728f48a6bab0a4",
      strip_prefix = "html5lib-python-1.0b8",
      build_file = str(Label("//third_party:html5lib.BUILD")),
  )
```
to
```
  native.new_http_archive(
      name = "org_html5lib",
      urls = [
          "http://bazel-mirror.storage.googleapis.com/github.com/html5lib/html5lib-python/archive/0.9999999.tar.gz",
          "https://github.com/html5lib/html5lib-python/archive/0.9999999.tar.gz",
      ],
      sha256 = "184257f98539159a433e2a2197309657ae1283b4c44dbd9c87b2f02ff36adce8",
      strip_prefix = "html5lib-python-0.9999999.tar.gz",
      build_file = str(Label("//third_party:html5lib.BUILD")),
  )
```

Attention,  the `googleapis` url for 0.9999999.tar.gz is not alive, but the `github` one will work, so it worked
